page.title: 07Eating habits.
page.content: Most people have four meals a day,{ {breakfast,dinner,tea and supper.} For many {breakfast}consists of cereals or toast with marmalade or jam and a cup of tea. Some however enjoy bacon and egg with beans and sausages. { Dinner,}eaten at mid-day, is varied. On Sunday most have roast meat, vegetables,gravy followed by a sweet. On Weekdays it could be egg and chips,sausage and chips,fish and chips or a roast dinner. Tea is always a light meal of sandwiches or bread and butter with cake or biscuits followed by tea or coffee. { Supper }can either be a light or heavy meal. Many do not eat{supper } because it is not good to eat a meal before going to bed. A drink is sufficient for me. (Victoria Jones. Age 11 years.)
